mapper.select: SELECT p.* FROM tab_pricepackages pp LEFT JOIN tab_prices p ON pp.price_sno=p.price_sno WHERE pp.chairs_sno=#{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tab_massagechairs (chairs_name, chairs_brand, install_sno, user3_sno, description, gsm_sno, chairs_status, chairs_createTime) VALUES (#{name}, #{brand}, #{installationAddress.id}, #{agency.id}, #{description}, #{gsmModule.id}, #{status.code}, #{createTime})
mapper.select: SELECT count(1) FROM tab_massagechairs WHERE user3_sno=#{id}
SELECT m.* FROM tab_massagechairs m LEFT JOIN tab_gsmmodules g ON m.gsm_sno=g.gsm_sno WHERE g.gsm_imei=#{imei}
SELECT m.* FROM tab_massagechairs m LEFT JOIN tab_gsmmodules g ON m.gsm_sno=g.gsm_sno LEFT JOIN tab_simcards s ON s.simcard_sno=g.simcard_sno WHERE s.sim=#{sim}
mapper.update: UPDATE tab_massagechairs SET chairs_name=#{name}, chairs_brand=#{brand}, description=#{description}, install_sno=#{installationAddress.id}, user3_sno=#{agency.id}, gsm_sno=#{gsmModule.id}, chairs_status=#{status.code}, chairs_updateTime=#{updateTime} WHERE chairs_sno=#{id}
